info.description: US Model Bank API for Sort codes
info.title: US Model Bank Bank sort codes

get.summary: API to retreive the list of all Financial institutions routing numbers and the respective  details or a to retreive the routing number details of a specific FI using the routing number or institute name
get.description: API to search and  retrieve the bank sort code details

parameters.name: instituteDirectoryId
parameters.description: Identifier of the internal reference to financial institute directories where routing number or BIC codes and address information are held

parameters.name: routingBiccode
parameters.description: Indicates the routing number of BIC code used to identify the financial institution

parameters.name: beneficiaryInstituteName
parameters.description: Indicates the name of financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

parameters.name: beneficiaryInstituteBranchName
parameters.description: Indicates the Branch name of the financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

parameters.name: beneficiaryInstituteCity
parameters.description: Indicates the City of financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: Identifier of the lead company of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch for the respective contract for customer data protection purposes. Example US0010001.

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: Indicates the pagination header attributes availability. If set to 'true', it fetches all the data

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

page_start.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

instituteDirectoryId.description: Identifier of the internal reference to financial institute directories where routing number or BIC codes and address information are held

routingBiccode.description: Indicates the routing number of BIC code used to identify the financial institution

beneficiaryInstituteName.description: Indicates the name of financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

beneficiaryInstituteAddress.description: Address of the routing or Intermediary Financial Institute. Information will be used in wire messages

beneficiaryInstituteBranchName.description: Indicates the Branch name of the financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

beneficiaryInstituteCity.description: Indicates the City of financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

beneficiaryInstituteZipCode.description: Indicates the Zip code of financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

beneficiaryInstituteCountryCode.description: Indicates the two digit country code of financial institution where the beneficiary account is held

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System
